name: CS50 Development Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget software-properties-common ca-certificates curl && sudo update-ca-certificates && curl -fsSL https://packagecloud.io/cs50/repo/gpgkey | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/cs50-archive-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/cs50-archive-keyring.gpg] https://packagecloud.io/cs50/repo/ubuntu/ focal main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/cs50.list && sudo apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive sudo apt-get install -y libcs50 build-essential gcc gdb make valgrind && pip install -r requirements.txt
